text: Gei mee ga hai dama labelaa ga haanau mai dana dama daane, gei mee ga helekai, “Deenei laa gei dogu lodo ga noho mau i dogu baahi, idimaa dela au gu haanau agu dama dogodolu.” Gei mee gaa gahi di ingoo o dana dama bolo “Levi”.29.34 Levi: di ingoo deenei le e hai dono lee be telekai Hebrew boloo “Noho i dogu baahi”
